casebody.data:
In the Matter of MEDIO SIZE DRESS CORPORATION, Bankrupt. Shirley Silk Co., Inc., Appellant, Irving Trust Company, Appellee. No. 481. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. July 9, 1934. Otto A. Samuels, of New York City (Samuel Sturtz, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Hahn, Abeson & Golin, of New York City (Julius J. Abeson, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
